content:
wASHINGTON AP  President Donald Trumps eldest son released an email chain Tuesday that shows him discussing plans to hear damaging information on Hillary Clinton that were described as 

The emails are the first documentary evidence that a top Trump associate took a meeting to hear damaging information about Clinton with the understanding that it was connected to a Russian government effort to help Trump in the  election PERIOD Trump Jr. in addition to being the presidents son was deeply involved in his presidential campaign PERIOD

In a statement Tuesday Trumps eldest son said he was posting the emails  The emails with music publicist Rob Goldstone show that Trump Jr PERIOD was told that the Russian government had information that could  Clinton and her dealings with Russia PERIOD

The information Goldstone wrote  Goldstone was seeking to set up a meeting between Trump Jr PERIOD and a Russian attorney that later took place at Trump Tower PERIOD

 Trump Jr PERIOD replied to Goldstone in one of a series of email exchanges the younger Trump posted to Twitter PERIOD The emails are dated early June PERIOD

Trump Jr PERIOD has acknowledged that he met shortly after that email exchange with a Russian lawyer Natalia Veselnitskaya during the presidential campaign with the understanding that the attorney would provide damaging information on Clinton PERIOD

title: Trump Jr. releases emails showing Russian aid for campaign | News | oudaily.com
